'Murray Stuart McCully' (born 19 February 1953 in Whangarei, Northland) is a New
Zealand politician. He is a member of the National Party, and Minister of
Foreign Affairs, Minister for Sport and Recreation,
and former Minister for the Rugby World Cup.
categories: Members of the Cabinet of New Zealand
